# function: slug

Returns true when the input string is a valid slug (lowercase letters, digits, and hyphens; no leading/trailing or consecutive hyphens).

## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    validatefx = {
      source  = "The-DevOps-Daily/validatefx"
      version = ">= 0.0.1"
    }
  }
}

provider "validatefx" {}

locals {
  slugs = [
    "my-application",
    "web-server-01",
    "api-v2",
    "user-profile",
    "data-pipeline-prod",
  ]

  checked_slugs = [
    for slug in local.slugs : {
      slug  = slug
      valid = provider::validatefx::slug(slug)
    }
  ]
}

output "checked_slugs" {
  value = local.checked_slugs
}
```

## Signature

<!-- signature generated by tfplugindocs -->
```text
slug(value string) bool
```

## Arguments

<!-- arguments generated by tfplugindocs -->
1. `value` (String, Nullable) String value to validate.
